chapters.title: Chapter 32: Sealed to the Flame
chapters.info: Sereille Bagand, p. 512 (655)—Mistress of Novices when Seaine was a novice and Accepted. She was raised Amyrlin the year Seaine was raised Aes Sedai; as Amyrlin, she was fiercer than Elaida could be with a sore tooth. See also Amyrlin Seat; Mistress of Novices.
